TopicTitle: Can I get a Kopernicus tutorial?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm interested in trying to make planets using Kopernicus. (I have no idea how to do it or how it works)

So, if someone could provide me with a tutorial or something, it would be much appreciated. Is it just a mod I install and tinker with? Again, I have no idea.

Thanks!   -Garbonzo
